item.description:
Planning Ahead....

There is parking available near the Lowell High School. Let's meet at the trolley station (see festival map) at noon. I will wear my straw sun hat and will try to stand away from any big crowds so you can find me. We will wait until 12:15 and then head over to Boarding House Park, a very short walk from the trolley. If you don't have my cell phone number drop me a line and I will email it to you. See you soon! :-)

The complete festival schedule and a map is online at http://www.lowellfolk...

The Lowell Folk Festival is the largest free folk festival in the United States with six outdoor stages with traditional music and dance. This is a fun multicultural event with music, dancing and lots of ethnic foods.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: The Lowell Folk Festival
